# Nickname-Generator
Nickname Generator in flipper zero
Easily create unique names using this app for flipper zero.

*Instructions:                                    
Press "left" or "right" to change the subject of the name.                                                                                       
Click "OK" to generate the name.                                                                            
Long click to exit*
